content.title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
content.details: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) is a financial inclusion program launched by the Government of India to ensure access to financial services, such as banking, savings, and insurance, for all citizens.
benefits: Accidental insurance cover of Rs. 2 lakh
eligibility: Minors can open accounts under guardianship
content.application_process: Accounts can be opened at any bank branch or BC outlet.
documents_required: Government ID proofs (Voter Card/PAN Card/Ration card)
Permanent Address proof (Passport/Driving License/Electricity Bill/Telephone Bill/Water Bill)
Filled and Signed PMJDY Account opening form
Any other document as notified by the Central Government

faqs.question: Can I Open A Joint Account Under Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can open a joint account under Pradhan Mantri Jan-Dhan Yojana.

faqs.question: Where Do I Open A Bank Account Under PMJDY?
faqs.answer: You can open a PMJDY account at any bank branch on Core Banking Solutions (CBS) or at a BC outlet of such Banks.

faqs.question: Can I Link My Mobile Number With My Bank Account Opened Under PMJDY?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can link your mobile number with your bank account.

faqs.question: What Is A Small Account or Chota Khata under PMJDY?
faqs.answer: A 'Small Account' can be opened in case of non availability of Officially Valid Documents (OVDs).

faqs.question: Does The PMJDY Scheme Offer Accidental Insurance Cover?
faqs.answer: All PMJDY Accounts are provided with a free Rupay Debit Card with inbuilt accidental insurance cover of Rs.2 lakh.

faqs.question: Is Overdraft/Loan Facility Available Under PMJDY?
faqs.answer: Overdraft facility up to Rs. 10,000 will be available to one account holder of PMJDY per household after 6 months of satisfactory conduct of the account.

faqs.question: What Are The Documents Required For Opening A Bank Account Under PMJDY?
faqs.answer: The following documents are required: AADHAAR, Government ID proofs, Permanent Address proof, Passport size photograph, Filled and Signed PMJDY Account opening form.

faqs.question: Can A RuPay Card Be Availed By Illiterate Account Holders?
faqs.answer: Yes. It can be availed by illiterate account holders as well.

faqs.question: Will I Get A Cheque Book Against My Bank Account?
faqs.answer: Cheque book(s) are not a mandatory feature of PMJDY A/cs.

faqs.question: Do Banks Charge Account Opening Fees For Opening An Account Under PMJDY?
faqs.answer: Banks do not charge any fees while opening PMJDY account.
